data.comment: The match is underway in Leicester.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy breaks free at King Power Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
In the minute 4, Leicester to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Everton at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 8, Leicester push forward at King Power Stadium and Harvey Barnes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Everton defence.
Can Leicester capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Everton.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Everton.
In the minute 11, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In Leicester, Robin Olsen of Everton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Everton.
Leicester's Nampalys Mendy has been booked in Leicester.
In the minute 17, Everton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Everton take a 0-1 lead thanks to Richarlison.
In the minute 21, Alex Iwobi instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Jamie Vardy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leicester.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Leicester in the half of Everton.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 26, Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 28, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in for Everton at King Power Stadium.
In Leicester Everton drive forward through Gylfi Sigurdsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Everton.
Richarlison for Everton is whistled offside.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Everton throw-in in Leicester's half.
In the minute 37, Can Everton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Everton's Richarlison gets in a shot on goal at King Power Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Cengiz Under for Leicester drives towards goal at King Power Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Play has been interrupted briefly in Leicester to check on Allan, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team has substituted Allan with Andre Gomes. Carlo Ancelotti is thus making his first change.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 43, Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 45, Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Lee Stephen Mason blows against Leicester's Jamie Vardy for offside.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leicester.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Mason Holgate (Everton) has received a yellow card from Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 49, Ben Godfrey (Everton) gets a yellow card.
Everton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Leicester.
Leicester are coming forward and Youri Tielemans gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Everton a goal kick.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Lee Stephen Mason signals a Everton throw-in in Leicester's half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 61, Everton needs to be cautious. Leicester have an attacking throw-in.
Brendan Rodgers (Leicester) is making a first substitution, with Ayoze Perez replacing Cengiz Under.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 64, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leicester.
Andre Gomes is booked for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Leicester.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Leicester.
The match at King Power Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Richarlison, who is down injured.
In the minute 72, Everton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Everton's Richarlison is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal! Everton extend their lead to 0-2 through Mason Holgate.
In the minute 74, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Everton throw-in in Leicester's half.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 77, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Brendan Rodgers is making the team's second substitution at King Power Stadium with Kelechi Iheanacho replacing Nampalys Mendy.
Gylfi Sigurdsson of Everton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Everton defender.
In the minute 82, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Lee Stephen Mason awards Everton a goal kick.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Everton.
Everton pushes forward through Gylfi Sigurdsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 87, Christian Fuchs (Leicester) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 89, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Jamie Vardy of Leicester is pulled up for offside.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leicester.
That's full-time at King Power Stadium. The final score is 0-2.
Anthony Gordon is replacing Dominic Calvert-Lewin for Everton at King Power Stadium.
The away team have replaced Alex Iwobi with Jonjoe Kenny. This is the third substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
